We finally made Oxygen Builder useful for agencies and multi user tasking.

With calibration plug-in everything is synced in real time even without pressing the same button and reloading the page or the builder.

Synchronisation is done between:

### Tabs

[Read more](http://dplugins-documentation.local/collaboration/sync-between-tabs/)
### Browsers

[Read more](http://dplugins-documentation.local/collaboration/sync-between-browsers/)
### Machines & the users

[Read more](http://dplugins-documentation.local/collaboration/multi-user-synchronization/)
